item.title: Hipsters Are Postmodernists
item.description:
Hipsters Are Postmodernists

One popular belief is that postmodernism as a movement was rooted in nostalgia. I disagree. Postmodernism started as an ironic movement, much like an ironic hipster mustache gains enough popular momentum to be propelled into main stream culture. Feeling stifled by ultra constrained modernism, some artists and architects experimented with kitschy ionic columns and garish colors as a folly. The irony of designing warped Italianate structures after being trained to respect rational cleanliness must have been exhilarating for architects like Robert Venturi, who wrote "less is a bore" in response to Mies Van der Rohe's famous dictum "less is more."
